reviewText: Both my kids love this series! You have to understand that my son is many years older than his little sister yep somehow they both make the connection and enjoy it. The series takes you from beginning to end so that means that whatever happens in one episode is built upon in the next episode. Its smart,it has a good pace & it's funny. Point is, it's basically an enjoyable ride without being mature anime.
summary: Nice show for kids 6+. Family friendly anime!
Title: Code Lyoko: Season 2

reviewText: The episodes are in great clarity! It has all season two episodes, which include the epidoes: new order, uncharted territory, exploration, a great day, mister puck, st. valentines day, final mix, missing link, the chips are down, marabounta, common interest, temptation, a bad turn, attack of the zombies, ultimatum, a fine mess, xana kiss, vertigo, cold war, deja vu, tip top shape, is anybody out there, franz hopper, contact, revelation, and the key.If you are code lyoko fan I would recomend this item; along with the other seasons.
summary: Great for any code lyoko fan!

reviewText: This show is great! I was so happy when I found it on Prime Instant Video!!! I've already watched seasons 1-2 and now I'm on season 3 and can't wait to watch it!
Title: Code Lyoko: Season 2

reviewText: I have been watching this ever since I was little and it was, for a time, the only thing I ever watched on TV. now it's on DVD and I love it. It is about a group of teens who go in to fight a virus on a super computer named X.A.N.A and stop it from coming out and taking over the world. This season does not vary much from the first season, but it is still really awesome. The only thing that has really changed is that new characters are introduced and a few of the hero's get new powers. Now I do have to say there are two cons to consider here:1)The show does get  quite repetitive at times. there is very little change in the main objective to each episode though the objective does change slightly with the next season and a lot with the last two.2)These videos are printed on DVD-R disks. That means that some DVD players will not be able to play these disks. be sure to know your DVD player and it's limits before buying this.Overall, I have to say that if your into anime and don't mind the fast talking, repetitive nature, and love computers and science fiction; then this show is a must have.
summary: Not much change from the first season, but still awesome!
Title: Code Lyoko: Season 2

reviewText: I saw code lyoko on tv but never saw the ending so i decided to buy the whole series this is season 2
